examples: The frog crossed the brook in three or four hops .

definitions.definition: A short journey , especially in the case of air travel, one that takes place on a private plane.
( sports , US ) A bounce , especially from the ground, of a thrown or batted ball.
( UK , US , slang , dated ) A dance ; a gathering for the purpose of dancing.
( networking ) The sending of a data packet from one host to an adjacent host as part of its overall journey.

secondary_definitions: A short journey , especially in the case of air travel, one that takes place on a private plane.
( sports , US ) A bounce , especially from the ground, of a thrown or batted ball.
( UK , US , slang , dated ) A dance ; a gathering for the purpose of dancing.
( networking ) The sending of a data packet from one host to an adjacent host as part of its overall journey.

definitions.definition: A plant of species Humulus lupulus , native to northern Europe, female flowers of which are used to flavour many types of beer during brewing .
( usually in the plural ) The flowers of the hop plant , dried and used to brew beer etc.
( US , slang ) Opium , or some other narcotic drug.
The fruit of the dog rose ; a hip .

main_definition: A plant of species Humulus lupulus , native to northern Europe, female flowers of which are used to flavour many types of beer during brewing .
